code: import{createStore,combineReducers,applyMiddleware,compose}from'redux';import initialState from'./initialState';import{postsReducer}from'./postsRedux';import{statusReducer}from'./postsRedux';import thunk from'redux-thunk';var subreducers={posts:postsReducer,tableRequestPending:statusReducer};var reducer=combineReducers(subreducers);var store=createStore(reducer,initialState,compose(applyMiddleware(thunk),window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION__&&window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION__()));export default store;
